article:
There are 244 'Catholic universities and colleges in the United
States'. [http://www.accunet.org/i4a/pages/index.cfm?pageid=3489 Association
of Catholic Colleges and Universities] They make up a significant number
within the whole amount of Catholic universities and colleges in the world.
